channel.title: Projects on Deeksha D
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Deeksha D

item.title: MURA Classification Tool
item.description: Visualizing the classification results of MURA using D3 and javascript. Implemeted multiple CNNs to classify body parts(AlexNet) and abnormality for a specific body part(DenseNets)

item.title: Stock Analysis using Topic Modeling(LDA)
item.description: Study the impact of news headlines across various topics on NASDAQ prices. Employed and compared performace results of topic modeling(LDA), regression analysis, and neural networks.

item.title: Classification methods for Predictive Credit Scoring
item.description: Study and analyze classification methods for credit-scoring. Classifier used : SVM, Random forests, and Neural Networks.
